import {React} from "react"; import './cnts/cnt.css'; import '../App.css'; import './pages.css'; import Tilt from 'react-vanilla-tilt'; import profile_all from "../img/profile_all.jpg"; const Profile =() => { return(

Introduce Myself
Myself

연락처 :     010-3892-8331
